mapper.sql: id, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, car_name, car_brand, car_num, status
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM oa_car WHERE status = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT
FROM oa_car WHERE 1 = 1
and concat_ws(',', car_name, car_brand, car_num) LIKE '%' #{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
ORDER BY create_time limit #{start, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM oa_car WHERE 1 = 1
AND concat_ws(',', car_name, car_brand, car_num) LIKE '%' #{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
mapper.update:
update oa_car
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
car_name = #{carName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
